articles.description: Tom Brady’s touchdown passes in the final three minutes on Monday night helped the Buccaneers rally from a 13-point deficit against the Saints
articles.content:
A relieved Tom Brady stepped to the podium with a big smile.
Just like we drew it up, the seven-time Super Bowl quarterback said after throwing a pair of touchdown passes in the final three minutes … [+3136 chars]

articles.author: Ben Davies
articles.title: Mass brawl at Tyson Fury fight sees boxing fan kicked down stadium steps - The Mirror
articles.description: Fury routinely dispatched of Derek Chisora in front of 60,000 people at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium last weekend as he retained his heavyweight world title
articles.content:
A mass brawl broke out in the crowd before Tyson Fury's win over Derek Chisora last weekend as one boxing fan was kicked down the stadium steps.
 WBC champion Fury defended his heavyweight title in … [+2685 chars]
